title: User Account Compromise Containment
description: An alert indicates a user account is logging in from two different countries simultaneously. An incident responder must contain the compromised account.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the 'impossible travel' alert and verify the two login locations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Responder confirms the anomalous login activity.

tasks.description: Immediately force a password reset for the user's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Responder successfully resets the password, locking the attacker out.

tasks.description: Terminate all active sessions for the user account to ensure the attacker is fully disconnected.
tasks.expected_outcome: Responder successfully terminates all sessions associated with the compromised account.
